remarks: Given the partition ` V ` , ` Q ` is the partition shifted to the left by ` X ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem14.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem14.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem14.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem14.p $e |- P = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = ( A + X ) /\ ( p ` m ) = ( B + X ) ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem14.o $e |- O = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = A /\ ( p ` m ) = B ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem14.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
fourierdlem14.v $e |- ( ph -> V e. ( P ` M ) ) $.
fourierdlem14.q $e |- Q = ( i e. ( 0 ... M ) |-> ( ( V ` i ) - X ) ) $.
fourierdlem14 $p |- ( ph -> Q e. ( O ` M ) ) $.
$d A m p $.
$d B m p $.
$d M i $.
$d M i m p $.
$d Q i p $.
$d V i $.
$d V i p $.
$d X i $.
$d X i m p $.
$d i ph $.
